column1: Fujin (simplified Chinese: 富锦; traditional Chinese: 富錦; pinyin: Fùjǐn) is a county-level city in the east of Heilongjiang province
column2: People's Republic of China. It is under the jurisdiction of the prefecture-level city of Jiamusi.

column1: Fujin has a humid continental climate (Köppen Dwa)
